Text: Panalytix Inc APeX ReleasePanalytixIncReleases APeX Version Click Calibration Pricing and Hedging Calibrate price and hedge any exotic eg Bermudan Cancelable Swap using any model MultiFactor HJM BK HullWhite with easy clicks Bloomberg Alliance Access Live feeds provided via Open Bloomberg New mechanism accesses any Excelcompatible OLEDDE source for live feeds Bloomberg ReutersTibCo Bridge New Performance Benchmarks seconds to calibrate and price a Bermudan nc using Factor path HJM model on a MHzMB Pentium APeX Version featuring MultiCurrency MultiFactor HJM is in Beta release For more information and thenew Downloadable Demo of APeX please visit our website at newshtml For sales information or to arrange for a presentation of APeX please contact Barbara Brandfass
